why: Gratitude can lower stress reactivity and pain sensitivity.

slides.title: Why Gratitude?
slides.content: Shifts attention to safety and support; reduces stress load.

slides.title: How to Start
slides.content: Write 2–3 specifics; include why they mattered today.

slides.title: Make it Stick
slides.content: Same time daily; small wins; share with a partner.

slides.title: Research Evidence
slides.content: Studies show gratitude practice activates reward pathways and reduces inflammatory markers.

slides.title: Myth vs Fact
slides.content: Myth: Toxic positivity. Fact: Honest gratitude can co‑exist with pain.

slides.title: Try this tonight
slides.content: Jot 3 lines: what happened; why it mattered; what it helps you do tomorrow.
